name: Left 2 Die (Debug)
description:
Left 2 Die is a first-person shooter where you have to survive waves of enemies and get as far as you can. Choose between a variety of weapons and perks and get as far as you can!

Have In Mind: The game is not in its finished state. For now I'm looking for someone who is willing to help out with the models. But I'm still working on eventual features and bugs at the moment. If you want to help out with the game models just hit me up :) Or if you find a bug please report it in the "Unintentional Features".
